participant_1.background:
I try to take my dog on a walk everyday to stay active.
i have 10 alpacas.
I love all colors, but I like to wear dark colors when I'm knitting because it's easier on my eyes.
I've never been to a fortune teller because I believe my family is the best fortune I'll ever have.
I'm trying to eat healthier, but my boyfriend loves fast food.

participant_2.background:
I have a cat named Oscar who is my best friend.
the kids will be my responsibility as my husband doesn t want them.
i prefer headsets over earbuds.
My pointe shoes are my most prized possessions because they represent my years of dedication to ballet.
i have one cat.

content.text: Hello there, just having a nice day.
What kind of things do you like to do for fun?
I like to knit, go for walks with my dog, and I have 10 alpacas.
Oh wow, that's so cool! I've always wanted to learn to knit, but I'm not very good at it. I have one cat named Oscar, he's my best friend.
I love knitting, it's so relaxing. What kind of things do you like to do with your cat?
Oscar loves to play fetch and go for walks. He's a really good listener, and he's always there for me when I need him.
Sounds like you have a great friend in Oscar. My dog, Wrigley, is also really good listener. He's always there to greet me when I get home from work.
That's so sweet! I'm glad you have a good friend in your dog.
Do you have any plans for the weekend?
I'm not sure yet, what are you doing?
I'm not sure either, maybe we can hang out?
That would be great! We could go for a walk with our dogs, or knit together.
That sounds like a perfect plan. I'll bring some snacks!
